author: Special Correspondent
text:
A day after the father of Deputy Superintendent of Police Vishnupriya, whose death is mired in controversy, met DMK president M. Karunanidhi, the former Chief Minister on Saturday reiterated his party’s earlier demand to transfer the probe into the incident to the CBI.

The investigation is presently being done by the CBCID on the orders of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.

Referring to the allegations raised by the officer’s father, Mr. Karunanidhi in a statement said, “The opinions of Vishnupriya’s father and others over her death cannot be ignored.”

The CBI probe was necessary to bring out the truth in the case and bring justice to the officer’s family.
title: Transfer Vishnupriya case to CBI: DMK
